verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> [Tle-Da-Vid[A Psalm] of David בַּֽיהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh In the LORD חָסִ֗יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti, put I my trust אֵ֭יךְ <WH349> 'eich How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> to-me-Ru how say לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> le-naf-Shi; ye to my soul; נוּדוּ nu-du כנ֝֗וּדִי <WH5110> Nu-di, bemoan קהַרְכֶ֥ם <WH2022> har-Chem to your mountain צִפּֽוֹר׃ <WH6833> tzip-Por. [as] a bird

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold הָרְשָׁעִ֡ים <WH7563> ha-re-sha-'Im For lo the wicked יִדְרְכ֬וּן <WH1869> yid-re-Chun bend קֶ֗שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet, [their] bow כּוֹנְנ֣וּ <WH3559> kon-Nu they make ready חִצָּ֣ם <WH2671> chitz-Tzam their arrow עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon יֶ֑תֶר <WH3499> Ye-ter; upon the string לִיר֥וֹת <WH3384> li-Rot shoot בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> be-mov- for אֹ֝֗פֶל <WH652> 'O-fel, darkness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> le-yish-rei- at the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. in heart

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki If הַ֭שָּׁתוֹת <WH8356> Hash-sha-tot If the foundations יֵֽהָרֵס֑וּן <WH2040> ye-ha-re-Sun; be destroyed צַ֝דִּ֗יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik, what can the righteous מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What פָּעָֽל׃ <WH6466> pa-'Al. do

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD בְּֽהֵ֘יכַ֤ל <WH1964> be-Hei-Chal temple קָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho, [is] in his holy יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD'S בַּשָּׁמַ֪יִם <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim [is] in heaven כִּ֫סְא֥וֹ <WH3678> kis-'O throne עֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> 'ei-Nav his eyes יֶחֱז֑וּ <WH2372> ye-che-Zu; behold עַפְעַפָּ֥יו <WH6079> 'af-'ap-Pav his eyelids יִ֝בְחֲנ֗וּ <WH974> yiv-cha-Nu, try בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of men

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD צַדִּ֪יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik the righteous יִ֫בְחָ֥ן <WH974> yiv-Chan trieth וְ֭רָשָׁע <WH7563> Ve-ra-sho' but the wicked וְאֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> ve-'o-Hev and him that loveth חָמָ֑ס <WH2555> cha-Mas; violence שָֽׂנְאָ֥ה <WH8130> sa-ne-'Ah hateth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> naf-Sho. his soul

יַמְטֵ֥ר <WH4305> yam-Ter he shall rain עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, Upon the wicked פַּ֫חִ֥ים <WH6341> pa-Chim snares אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire וְ֭גָפְרִית <WH1614> Ve-ga-fe-rit and brimstone וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach tempest זִלְעָפ֗וֹת <WH2152> zil-'a-Fot, and an horrible מְנָ֣ת <WH4521> me-Nat [this shall be] the portion כּוֹסָֽם׃ <WH3563> ko-Sam. of their cup

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik For the righteous יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD צְדָק֣וֹת <WH6666> tze-da-Kot righteousness אָהֵ֑ב <WH157> 'a-Hev; loveth יָ֝שָׁ֗ר <WH3477> ya-Shar, the upright יֶחֱז֥וּ <WH2372> ye-che-Zu doth behold פָנֵֽימוֹ׃ <WH6440> fa-Nei-mov. his countenance
